summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing charges for services rendered. The invoice includes information about a shipment made on February 18, 2002, and lists a recipient named Nicole Junkermann. The total amount due is $11.91.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

persons.name: Nicole Junkermann
persons.context: Nicole Junkermann is listed as the recipient of a shipment associated with the invoice, suggesting a connection to Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein is the sender of a shipment addressed to Junkermann, indicating a business relationship.

events.title: Shipment Sent

locations: Residencia Piccola Venezia, Via San Michele 7, Caslano
keyFacts: The invoice is dated March 1, 2002, and is for a total of $11.91.
The shipment was sent on February 18, 2002, and delivered on February 20, 2002.
The recipient of the shipment was Nicole Junkermann.
The invoice includes details about customs and duties associated with the shipment.
The document is marked as confidential.
